snippet.title: Please Wake Up - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist us on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1397800/Please_Wake_Up

“Please Wake Up” is an original horror game that will hack your brain. Most horror games present the player with a hypothetical scare, oftentimes of creatures or gore. “Please Wake Up” uses psychological techniques and illusions to present many horrifying truths about the nature of memory, perception, and reality. It has simple and accessible, yet engaging, gameplay that gives the player a fear of their own mind.
